Package com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColorSensor
    An abridged version of the FTC ColorSensor interface.
    CRServo
    CRServo interface included for compatibility with FTC SDK.
    DcMotor
    DcMotor is an abridged version of the FTC DcMotor interface.
    DcMotorSimple
    Represents a simple DC Motor
    DistanceSensor
    Represents a distance sensor
    GyroSensor
    Represents a simple Gyro Sensor.
    HardwareDevice
    Interface to represent any hardware device that can be managed by HardwareMap.
    Servo
    Provides an subset of the functionality of the Servo interface in the FTC SDK.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CRServoImpl
    Implementation of the CRServo interface.
    DcMotorImpl
    Implementation of the DcMotor interface.
    GamePad
    Represents the GamePad.
    GyroSensorImpl
    Implementation of the GyroSensor interface
    HardwareMap
    HardwareMap provides access to the virtual robot hardware
    ServoImpl
    Implementation of the Servo interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DcMotor.RunMode
    Enum of operation modes available for DcMotor.
    DcMotorSimple.Direction
    DcMotors can be configured to internally reverse the values to which, e.g., their motor power is set.
    MotorType
    For internal use only.
    Servo.Direction
    Direction enum to allow software to internally reverse the values to which position is set.
